1.text: Use your dominant foot to roll the ball up your opposite leg.

3.text: Land on your dominant foot as you kick the ball with your heel.

4.text: Dribble the ball fairly quickly towards a defender.

5.text: Place your dominant foot's heel in front of the ball while leaning forward a bit.

6.text: Bring your non dominant foot behind the ball.

7.text: Use your dominant foot to sweep the ball up the opposite leg.

8.text: Lean forward and kick the ball up with your heel.
